title: Khita van hmun nuamah khian tlante an zai
lyrics:
Khita van hmun nuamah khian tlante an zai,
An Lalpa hmaah an lallukhumte dahin,
Khawvel lungngaihna leh buaina an pel ta;
Mi thianghlimten chhandamna hla thar an sa.

Beramno fakin, hmana Kalvari-a thi kha,
Beramno fakin, chatuan atan nung leha chu.

Aw, hmangaihna hla mak tak a lo kim ta!
Rimtui, rangkachak berhbu a lo khat ta,
Lalpa thihna leh thawhlehna avangin,
Pathian hnenah chatuanin ro kan rel ang.

Beramno thisena inbual chauh lo chuan,
Chu hla thar chu tu man an sa thei lo vang;
Sual ata Chhandamtu'n min tleng fai tawh chuan,
Tunah lawm hla ropui takin i rem ang.
